::Cygnar::
    "Good.  I hope they'll aid us against the Trainers.  We need to make a 
stand.  We need to prove that we won't be defeated because of the loss of our 
commander and half of our troops."  He looks around the mess hall.  "So you 
want to know about me?  So do I.  I landed here not too long ago.  I can't 
remember anything before that.  I landed next to a transformer who seemed 
evil so I killed him (Typo Demon).  I sent out a general message and 
Magmatron summoned me to the Sulaco.  There I was reprogrammed into a 
Destron.  I don't remember what I was before, nor do I care.  My loyalty is 
to the Destron cause now."
